snippet: Malcolm A. Smith was open about his ambitions to run for mayor of New York City. On Monday, he goes on trial in federal court on charges of bribery and extortion for trying to influence county leaders to certify him as a Republican in the 2013 race.
abstract: Malcolm A Smith, Democratic Queens state senator who had ambitions to run for mayor of New York City, goes on trial in federal court on charges of bribery and extortion for trying to bribe Republican county leaders and a Queens city councilman so they would certify him as a Republican in the 2013 race.
lead_paragraph: Malcolm A. Smith was open about his ambitions to run for mayor of New York City. On Monday, he goes on trial in federal court on charges of bribery and extortion for trying to influence county leaders to certify him as a Republican in the 2013 race.

headline.main: Trial Begins for Queens Democrat Charged With Bribery, Extortion and Fraud
headline.print_headline: Trial Begins for Queens Democrat Charged With Bribery, Extortion and Fraud
